alfredsnippet.snippet:
create_table t.table_name do |t|
  t.string :string_column_name, null: false, default: '', limit: 255, collation: 'utf8mb4_unicode_ci', comment: ''
  t.text :text_column_name, null: false, default: '', limit: 255, collation: 'utf8mb4_unicode_ci'
  t.integer :integer_column_name, null: false, default: 0, limit: 255
  t.bigint :bigint_column_name
  # t.float not recommended
  t.decimal :decimal_column_name, precision: 10, scale: 2
  # t.numeric
  t.datetime :datetime_column_name, precision: 2
  t.time :time_column_name, precision: 2
  t.date :date_column_name
  t.binary :binary_column_name, limit: 2.megabytes
  t.blob :blob_column_name
  t.boolean :boolean_column_name, null: false, default: false
end
alfredsnippet.name: create_table
